short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help you open links in the Incognito window with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**To use this feature user need to allow this plugin for incognito, watch featured video.

This plugin makes it simple and fast to work with incognito mode.

Features:
1. Open the existing page in an incognito window with just one click
2. Open all open tabs in incognito with just one click
3. Search selected text in incognito
4. Open a link in incognito
